employees.name: Adam
employees.title: Licensed Physical Therapist
employees.bio: Adam is a licensed physical therapist with over a decade of experience in sports injury rehabilitation and post-op recovery. He specializes in personalized exercise plans and hands-on manual therapy to help patients return to peak function.

employees.name: Jeff
employees.title: Movement Specialist
employees.bio: Jeff is a movement specialist focused on functional training and gait analysis. He helps athletes and active adults recover safely and improve performance through evidence-based programs.

employees.name: Greg
employees.title: Orthopedic Manual Therapist
employees.bio: Greg is certified in orthopedic manual therapy with expertise in chronic pain management and ergonomic assessment. He emphasizes education and long-term strategies for sustained improvement.

employees.name: Lisa
employees.title: Pelvic Health Specialist
employees.bio: Lisa specializes in pelvic health and women's wellness, offering prenatal/postnatal rehab and pelvic floor therapy. Her compassionate care supports patients through life-stage transitions and recovery.

employees.name: Lee
employees.title: Balance & Vestibular Rehabilitation Expert
employees.bio: Lee is a balance and vestibular rehabilitation expert who creates fall-prevention and mobility programs for seniors and clients with neurological conditions. He prioritizes safe, progressive plans to restore confidence and independence.
